document.full_text: many diners enjoy bread with their soup. but in the mediterranean, it's common to serve soups thickened with fresh or stale bread, writes martha rose shulman in this week's recipes for health.
document.title: the delectable pairing of bread and soup
lines_and_colors: many diners enjoy bread with their soup. but in the mediterranean, it's common to serve soups thickened with fresh or stale bread, writes martha rose shulman in this week's recipes for health.
